Wildcat Corp. Ships [https://www./folder/zimh7hf7jobbn/UKNC_Ships](https://www./folder/zimh7hf7jobbn/UKNC_Ships)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-20T14:16:48Z" title="08/20/2015 02:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 20, 2015</time> by FTWG4M3RS**

> 
> United Kerbal Navy Corps Ships [https://www./folder/zimh7hf7jobbn/UKNC_Ships](https://www./folder/zimh7hf7jobbn/UKNC_Ships)

Hello mate, You will find that if you don't post pictures you wont get many replies or downloads. Do you know how to upload screenshots? I am happy to help if you don't know how.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TX362xOo6rA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 This is my first cinematic using these ships

> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TX362xOo6rA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
>  This is my first cinematic using these ships

That's awesome man! Do you still have pics you want to post? Do you use steam? If so, press f12 to take pics. Pressing f2 remove the hud for those cinematic shots. You can upload them to steam and then either press the little picture icon in the little toolbar above or just add this to the link of the steam screenshot:

 ![your pic link](your%20pic%20link) Without the spaces. 

MJ

i created a new thread for my organization if you want to check it out. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138571-United-Kerbal-Navy-Corps-U-K-N-C-Stock-Military-and-Civ-Ships-by-FTWGAMING](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138571-United-Kerbal-Navy-Corps-U-K-N-C-Stock-Military-and-Civ-Ships-by-FTWGAMING)
